item.title: [Rel] Primal 2H sword [Rel]
item.dc:creator: @mongoth666 mongoth666
item.description:
@mongoth666 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:16, topic:351729”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=448083.msg3290545#msg3290545 date=1280525875]
don’t ask for rep because most people will rep-- you instead.
@Ontopic:
Nice sword, mind showing wireframe?
[/quote]
This is runescape’s sword. Does it really require a wireframe?[/quote]

And yes, this is runescape’s sword, but runescape never released it yet, Why? idk. But i was mainly going for offset and zoom accuracy.

[quote=“usman555, post:15, topic:351729”]don’t ask for rep because most people will rep-- you instead.
@Ontopic:
Nice sword, mind showing wireframe?[/quote]

I was never asking -.-

I said rep if you want.

dutchboy:

Why, if i relese full primal here, my topic gets closed+removed, while when u leech a part of it, its super awesome, oh i know bcuz ur rep is higher then mine, making you invunerable to closed topics

you released the armor, not the weapons. And your zoom and offset models we’re a bit messy

=====================

bare with me guys, im trying to make the invo model for the primal long
